summary: Completed backend testing for Booner Trade v2.3.36 - News analyzer and extended backtest functionality verified

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 error with database connection issue

minor_issues.issue: Database file not found at expected path

passed_tests: News Analyzer Module Import - news_analyzer.py successfully imported
Market Regime Module Import - market_regime.py successfully imported
News API /api/news/current - Returns news data successfully
Backtest Strategies API /api/backtest/strategies - Returns 6 strategies and 5 commodities
Backtest Run API /api/backtest/run - Accepts extended parameters (market_regime, use_regime_filter, use_news_filter)
Backtest Execution - Completed successfully with 5 trades and P/L calculation
All Strategy Classes - Mean Reversion, Momentum, Breakout, Grid Trading initialized correctly
Strategy Methods - Bollinger Bands, Momentum calculation, Resistance/Support, Grid levels working

priority_items: Fix /api/settings endpoint database connection issue (520 error)
Verify SignalBot._check_news_automatically is being called during market data updates
verification_items: News analyzer get_current_news() function is available and working
Market regime detection system is imported and available
Backtest API accepts all extended parameters (market_regime, use_regime_filter, use_news_filter, use_trend_analysis)
Grid Trading and Market Regimes are implemented in strategy system
